name: Ghost Train VR
description: Ghost Train VR going to allow you to find the shivering sensations of a real ghost train, as if you were there.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or similar Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or similar Storage: 400 MB available space
